price: 27.Matablannaa! Diggah Yalli qaraanak lee oobiseeh, tokkel bisitte kak sissini caxâ mixu teetit neyyeeqem. Kaadu qaleelák gitittey qidii kee qisih taniy bisitte kak sissini (baxsa-le) ginne kaadu qaleelák ditih diyyit inna-le qaleelá ginnem.
arabic: وَإِن يُكَذِّبُوكَ فَقَدۡ كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ جَآءَتۡهُمۡ رُسُلُهُم بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ وَبِٱلزُّبُرِ وَبِٱلۡكِتَٰبِ ٱلۡمُنِيرِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-in yukadhibūka faqad kadhaba alladhīna min qablihim jāathum rusuluhum bil-bayināti wabil-zuburi wabil-kitābi al-munīri
